arts.ttl: Crystal Palace midfielder suffers knee injury against Bournemouth in Boxing Day clash
arts.sum: Palace manager Oliver Glasner said: “He got a knock on his knee in the first half, and we talked about it at half-time. With Hughes out, Doucoure is almost a certainty to start the next match at Selhurst Park, and the Austrian manager gave his thoughts on his contribution.

arts.ttl: Cherries hit with injury blow as Adam Smith set to be out for 'some time'
arts.sum: The Cherries have been hit with another injury blow as Adam Smith will be sidelined for ‘some time’.

arts.ttl: Justin Kluivert Escaping Father’s Shadow at Bournemouth
arts.sum: From Marcus Thuram to Timothy Weah to Federico Chiesa, more and more players are escaping the shadows of their legendary footballer fathers and making a name for themselves at the game’s top level. One such case is Bournemouth forward Justin Kluivert. Born in Amsterdam, Kluivert grew up in a footballing dynasty: his grandfather Kenneth represented […] The post Justin Kluivert Escaping Father’s Shadow at Bournemouth appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Glasner on ‘good point’ on the south coast
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner highlighted numerous positives from Crystal Palace’s performance after a 0-0 draw against in-form Bournemouth on Boxing Day.

arts.ttl: Guéhi’s honest opinion on Palace’s draw at Bournemouth
arts.sum: Marc Guéhi says Crystal Palace will be happy enough with a point at Bournemouth on Boxing Day – but provided an honest opinion on the match as a spectacle.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth maintain unbeaten run with Crystal Palace stalemate
arts.sum: The Cherries were unable to break down a Palace side hammered 5-1 by Arsenal at the weekend.

arts.ttl: Gallery: Palace in Boxing Day action at Bournemouth
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are seeking to make it a club-record three top-flight away wins in a row when they take on Bournemouth this afternoon – enjoy the best LIVE photos in our gallery below!
The festive action continues, as Palace head to the south coast to take on Bournemouth at the Vitality Stadium (KO: 15:00 GMT). Follow all the action as it happens on our live blog below!

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace injury news for Bournemouth match - good and bad news on selection front for Glasner
arts.sum: “It look like [he will be]”, said Glasner, talking on Christmas Eve, about the chances of Eze playing against Bournemouth, after the player suffered a foot injury in the first-half against Brighton earlier this month. “Chadi is training with us, [we’re] taking our time,” said Glasner to the South London Press about the Moroccan international who recently completed a half with the academy team as part of his rehabilitation.

arts.ttl: Palace star has been offered to Tottenham for transfer
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou appears to have been on the end of some criticism of late, with Tottenham’s 6-3 defeat at the hands of Liverpool doing the Australian no favours whatsoever. With the January transfer window just around the corner, the chance of bringing new faces in to help propel Tottenham up the Premier League is likely […] The post Palace star has been offered to Tottenham for transfer appeared first on CaughtOffside.
